products.name: Kingston KC3000 1TB SSD
products.description: PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 1024GB Solid State Drive.

products.name: Samsung 990 Pro 2TB SSD
products.description: PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 2048GB Solid State Drive.

products.name: be quiet! MC1 SSD Cooler
products.description: Stick-on heat sink for M.2 SSDs.

products.name: Corsair Vengeance 64GB RAM
products.description: 2 x 32GB, 6600 MHz, DDR5, DIMM RAM sticks.

products.name: Thermalright 120SE CPU Cooler
products.description: Twin-tower CPU cooler with 2x 120mm PWM fans that can reach up to 1550 RPM and six copper heat pipes. Compatible with AMD and Intel CPUs.

products.name: be quiet! Pure Rock 3 CPU Cooler
products.description: Single-tower CPU cooler with a max speed of 2000 RPM. Four powerful 6mm heatpipes with aluminium caps. Compatible with AMD and Intel CPUs.

products.name: MSI A750GL PCIE5 PSU
products.description: Powerful PC power supply designed for demanding applications. Total output of 750 watts, 80 PLUS Gold certification. Voltage range of 100 to 240 V.

products.name: be quiet! Pure Power 12 M PSU
products.description: Modular ATX 3.0 power supply designed for efficiency, stability, and quiet operation. Total output of 850 watts. Supports PCIe 5.0 GPUs with a 12VHPWR connector. 80 PLUS Gold certification for reliable energy performance.

products.name: Fractal Meshify C Solid Case
products.description: Compact, high-airflow mid-tower PC case. Solid side panel edition. Supports ATX/mATX/ITX motherboards, allows for large GPUs and tall CPU coolers, includes multiple fan/radiator mounting points, and offers good cable management with a PSU shroud and dust filters.

products.name: Fractal Define R5 Case
products.description: Mid-tower case with solid sound-dampening panels, a minimal front façade, and plenty of space for cable management and storage. Supports ATX/mATX motherboards and provides a clean, professional look that blends well into an office environment.

products.name: MSI PRO B650M-P Motherboard
products.description: Micro-ATX - Supports AMD Ryzen 7000 Series Processors, AM5 - DDR5 Memory Boost 6000+MHz/OC, 1 x PCIe 4.0 x16, 2 x M.2 Gen4, 2.5G LAN.

products.name: ASUS PRIME B550M-A Motherboard
products.description: AMD B550 (Ryzen AM4) micro ATX Motherboard. Dual M.2, PCIe 4.0, Wi-Fi 6, 1 Gb Ethernet, HDMI, DVI-D, D-Sub, SATA 6 Gbps, USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A and Aura Sync RGB Lighting.

products.name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 Ti Graphics Card
products.description: The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 Ti is built on the Ada Lovelace architecture, featuring 7,680 CUDA cores, 12GB of GDDR6X memory on a 192-bit bus, and boost clocks up to ~2.6 GHz. It supports DLSS 3 frame generation, real-time ray tracing, and delivers high-end performance with a typical board power of around 285W.

products.name: AMD Radeon RX 7900 XT
products.description: AMD B550 (Ryzen AM4) micro ATX Motherboard. Dual M.2, PCIe 4.0, Wi-Fi 6, 1 Gb Ethernet, HDMI, DVI-D, D-Sub, SATA 6 Gbps, USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A and Aura Sync RGB Lighting.

products.name: Intel Core i7-13700K
products.description: Features 16 cores (8 Performance + 8 Efficient) and 24 threads, with boost clocks up to 5.4 GHz and support for DDR4/DDR5 memory. Built on Intel’s Raptor Lake architecture, it offers excellent single-threaded performance and high multicore throughput for gaming and content creation.

products.name: AMD Ryzen 5 7600
products.description: 6-core, 12-thread CPU based on the Zen 4 architecture, with boost clocks up to 5.1 GHz and support for DDR5 and PCIe 5.0. With a 65W TDP and efficient integrated RDNA 2 graphics, it delivers smooth office performance while remaining cool and power-efficient.
